global.genericError: We ran into an error. Please refresh and try again.
global.identityError: An error occurred during the verification process. Please try again.

challengePage.title: Let's begin by finding your info
challengePage.subTitle: We can prefill some of this request like your name, address, and contact info for you.

otpEntry.title: We sent you a 6-digit verification code by text message to your phone number. Please enter it below:

continueAuth.successMessage: Your identity is verified. Please go back to the app to complete this process.
continueAuth.errorMessage: An error occurred and you could not be verified. Please contact support.

smsWaiting.title: Verify your mobile
smsWaiting.subTitle: Please click on the link we just sent to phone number ending in
smsWaiting.returnToChallenge: Please click to return to Challenge Page
smsWaiting.successMessage: Your identity is verified. Please close this tab and continue your session on your mobile device.
smsWaiting.errorMessage: An error occurred and you could not be verified. Please contact support.

reviewInfo.title: Your Information
reviewInfo.subTitle: All fields are required unless stated otherwise

ssn.label: Social Security Number
ssn.errorText: Enter the last 4 of your social security number
ssn.moreInfo: By providing your last 4 of your SSN, we will attempt to find your information to expedite your request.
ssn.disclaimer: This is required by finance regulations

extendedAddress.label: Extended Address
extendedAddress.errorText: Enter your extended address (apt. number, suite, etc...)
